questions.question: 1. The core cutter method can be used for gravels, boulders, or any other hard surface.

explanations.a: It is difficult to cut through hard surfaces using the core cutter apparatus.

questions.question: 2. The field density of a natural soil deposit cannot be determined by ____ method.

explanations.b: The methods for determining field density are: sand replacement method, core cutter method, water displacement method and rubber balloon method. The oven-dry method is used for the determination of water content.
explanations.c: This method can be used as is demonstrated by this very experiment.

questions.question: 3. In its natural condition, a soil sample has a mass of 1.980 kg and a volume of 0.001 m<sup>3</sup>. After being completely dried in an oven, the mass of the sample is 1.800 kg. The specific gravity is 2.7. The unit weight of water is 10 kN/m<sup>3</sup>. The degree of saturation of soil is ____

explanations.a: It is a direct application of the formula.
